entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
